channel.title: New blocks in 1.2.4
channel.description:
So a highlight of the 1.2.4 update is a few more decorative blocks, i really like them, but it looks like people will now need to have 4 different tree farms for the 4 different planks
as for the sandstone, the creeper face is a nice touch, and i like the smooth sandstone
[IMG]http://i551.photobucket.com/albums/ii448/badger41badger41/2012-03-22_233646.png[/img]

item.title: New blocks in 1.2.4
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:17, topic:437219”][quote author=hat trix link=topic=539932.msg3954306#msg3954306 date=1332608618]
also, you can lay stairs upside down. not sure if that was with 1.2.3 or 1.2.4
[/quote]
wrong. they are called “Upsidedown stairs” a different recipe. not the same.[/quote]

its not a different recipe, stairs can be rotated on X and Y axis now

this development seems intriguing because now im pretty sure theyll add like vertical half steps or floating half steps etc

Read full topic

item.title: New blocks in 1.2.4
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Question about ‘tree farms’, do the two non-standard tree types not grow under ground ever, even if there is enough space above them? I could never find any info on this, but I planted some under ground and they NEVER grow, there is plenty of light and head space, and regular trees grow just fine.

For oaks an underground tree farm should be eight blocks in height, plus trees need two blocks of empty space between them and an adjacent lightsource.
My treefarm in w1 is also an underground one, it has room for about 40 trees (5 rows of 8 trees).
Trees like birches are higher so they’ll need more space between them

Read full topic

item.title: New blocks in 1.2.4
item.dc:creator: @deathwilldie0 deathwilldie0
item.description:
@deathwilldie0 wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:7, topic:437219”]Im not sure if this is a new update with 1.2.4, but monsters now drop enchanted items? I got an enchanted bow from a skeleton

Question about ‘tree farms’, do the two non-standard tree types not grow under ground ever, even if there is enough space above them? I could never find any info on this, but I planted some under ground and they NEVER grow, there is plenty of light and head space, and regular trees grow just fine.

I haven’t had any luck with that either, I usually just use bone meal lol[/quote]

I believe the item drop was added with 1.2.3. But yes, you can get enchanted items with drops now.

Read full topic

Im not sure if this is a new update with 1.2.4, but monsters now drop enchanted items? I got an enchanted bow from a skeleton

Moparisthebest:

Question about ‘tree farms’, do the two non-standard tree types not grow under ground ever, even if there is enough space above them? I could never find any info on this, but I planted some under ground and they NEVER grow, there is plenty of light and head space, and regular trees grow just fine.

I haven’t had any luck with that either, I usually just use bone meal lol

item.title: New blocks in 1.2.4
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

krackkid:

Hmm maybe some kind of creeper dungeon is i n the near future?

doubt it, the sandstone blocks are easy to craft.

4 sand = 1 sandstone, 4 sandstone = 4 smooth sandstone

2 sandstone half slabs crafted = 1 creeper sandstone
